description:
8.90 flanger
Apply a flanging effect to the audio.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: flanger

options.description: Set base delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 30. Default value is 0.
options.name: delay

options.description: Set added sweep delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 10. Default value is 2.
options.name: depth

options.description: Set percentage regeneration (delayed signal feedback). Range from -95 to 95. Default value is 0.
options.name: regen

options.description: Set percentage of delayed signal mixed with original. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 71.
options.name: width

options.description: Set sweeps per second (Hz). Range from 0.1 to 10. Default value is 0.5.
options.name: speed

options.description: Set swept wave shape, can be triangular or sinusoidal. Default value is sinusoidal.
options.name: shape

options.description: Set swept wave percentage-shift for multi channel. Range from 0 to 100. Default value is 25.
options.name: phase
